version.description: Please do not alter this value

appDesc.message: Quickly opens the JIRA with the corresponding ticket
appDesc.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store.

currentTab.description: Button for opening in the current tab

newTab.description: Button for opening in a new tab

lastTicket.description: Button for opening the last ticket again

defaultTitle.description: Message displayed on the settings page of Chrome

baseURL.description: base URL you need to enter for a valid ticket URL

baseURLDescription.message: Please enter here the JIRA URL for the Quick Search. Please keep in mind that the URL needs to end with an equals sign.
baseURLDescription.description: Description text of the base URL

baseURLExample.description: Info text with an example JIRA URL. URL is followed after the sentence

baseURLMoreInfo.message: More information regarding the JIRA Quick Search can be found here:
baseURLMoreInfo.description: Info text for the JIRA QuickSearch function. URL is followed after the sentence

defaultAction.description: Default action (new tab or current tab) for opening a ticket

defaultActionDescription.message: Choose between the default action when the form is submitted via the enter key. Either open the ticket in the current or a new tab.
defaultActionDescription.description: Description text for the default action

savedOptions.description: Text displayed when button is pressed

supportDevelopment.message: Do you want to support the development of Quick JIRA?

donationChain.message: Donation chain — You donate → I can buy some coffee → faster updates & more features → you profit! :)
